The user makes the water under their opponent explode, launching them into the air. They then jump above them, creating a large whirlpool around their arm, striking the opponent with it and creating a large water explosion.

==Trivia==
* Though only appearing in the video game series, this technique was illustrated in the ''[[Naruto: One Decade, One Hundred Ninja]]'' guidebook.
